original_text: They were scorched by the fierce heat, and they cursed the name of God who had power over these plagues. They did not repent and give him glory.
korean_text: 사람들이 크게 태움에 태워진지라 이 재앙들을 행하는 권세를 가지신 하나님의 이름을 비방하며 또 회개하지 아니하고 주께 영광을 돌리지 아니하더라

sentences.original_text: They were scorched by the fierce heat
and they cursed the name of God
who had power over these plagues
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 이 재앙들 위에 권세를 가지셨습니다
